mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room (ac_id, ro_name, ro_basic_count, ro_max_count, ro_info, ro_count) VALUES (#{ac_id}, #{ro_name}, #{ro_basic_count}, #{ro_max_count}, #{ro_info}, #{ro_count})
INSERT INTO ro_pic (pic_num, room_num, pic_name) VALUES (ro_pic_num_seq.nextval, #{room_num}, #{pic_name})
mapper.update: update room set ro_name=#{ro_name}, ro_basic_count=#{ro_basic_count}, ro_max_count=#{ro_max_count}, ro_info=#{ro_info}, ro_count=#{ro_count}, room_price= #{room_price} where room_num=#{room_num}
mapper.select: select * from room where room_num=(select max(room_num) from room)
select pic_num, room_num, REPLACE(pic_name,'\','/') AS pic_name from ro_pic where room_num=#{room_num}
